General.Name: Xinxiang Tianli Energy Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Xinxiang Tianli Energy Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of ternary cathode materials for lithium batteries in China. The company offers precursors and finished products. Its products have applications in the fields of electric vehicles, electric bicycles, mobile energy storage, and power tools. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Xinxiang, China.
